A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film made me angry.  So many storylines built up in The Force awakens just fizzled out for no reason.  Luke wouldn't act like he did and his death  was idiotic.  The cringing casino part could've been avoided if the vice admiral had said what her plan was from the beginning.  Snoke and Phasma were pointless characters in the end.  Yep\, left me angry..
